meanings.definition: A person who seeks to promote human welfare and social reform.
meanings.sent1: Many humanitarians volunteer at shelters to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The humanitarians organized a fundraiser to support the local community.
meanings.sent3: The group of humanitarians decided to host a bake sale to raise money for charity.
meanings.sent4: She was a true humanitarian, always putting the needs of others before her own.
meanings.sent5: The humanitarians worked tirelessly to improve the living conditions of the homeless.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the promotion of human welfare and social reform.
meanings.sent1: Their humanitarian efforts led to positive changes in the community.
meanings.sent2: The organization's humanitarian mission focused on helping marginalized groups.
meanings.sent3: It was a humanitarian gesture to offer free meals to those in need.
meanings.sent4: The humanitarian approach to solving social issues was well-received by the public.
meanings.sent5: The humanitarian projects aimed to create a better future for all.
